attributes.action: As a British Citizen whomever you choose to marry should automatically become a British national.
attributes.additional_details: The Government should introduce laws that allow a British National to marry a person from whichever country they choose. Once the couple are legally married then the foreign partner should be able to apply for British citizenship with a simple form and a small admin cost of ten pounds. To deny the basic right of two people to fall in love and marry is a tyranny of the state that can no longer be ignored.
